Creation of RDD from Data

Dans ce notebook nous allons charger les données dans des RDD

paragraphs.text: %md Les fichiers sont stockés compressés, on a besoin d'un bout de code pour les décompresser en parallel sur les workers au fur et a mesure qu'on les lit depuis S3:

msg.data: Les fichiers sont stockés compressés, on a besoin d’un bout de code pour les décompresser en parallel sur les workers au fur et a mesure qu’on les lit depuis S3:

paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.input.PortableDataStream
import java.util.zip.ZipInputStream
import java.io.BufferedReader
import java.io.InputStreamReader


def RDDDownloader(fileName: String): org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = 
{
    val resultRDD = sc.binaryFiles(fileName). // charger quelques fichers via une regex
    flatMap {  // decompresser les fichiers
       case (name: String, content: PortableDataStream) =>
          val zis = new ZipInputStream(content.open)
          Stream.continually(zis.getNextEntry).
                takeWhile(_ != null).
                flatMap { _ =>
                    val br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(zis))
                    Stream.continually(br.readLine()).takeWhile(_ != null)
                }
    }
    return resultRDD
}
// Export Events
val eventsRDD = RDDDownloader("/media/storage/gdelt/12/2018120*.export.CSV.zip")

import java.util.zip.ZipInputStream

RDDDownloader: (fileName: String)org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String]
eventsRDD: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[1] at flatMap at <console>:33
cachedEvents: eventsRDD.type = MapPartitionsRDD[1] at flatMap at <console>:33

SQLDATE: String,

Actor1KnownGroupCode: String,

import java.text.SimpleDateFormat

def toDouble(s : String): Double = if (s.isEmpty) 0 else s.toDouble
def toInt(s : String): Int = if (s.isEmpty) 0  else s.toInt
def toBigInt(s : String): BigInt = if (s.isEmpty) BigInt(0) else BigInt(s)
 
val inputFormat_ymd = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMdd")
val outputFormat_ymd = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd")

val inputFormat_ym = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMM")
val outputFormat_ym = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM")

val inputFormat_ymdhms = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddhhmmss")
val outputFormat_ymdhms = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss")
    
def parse_date(s : String, inputFormat : SimpleDateFormat, outputFormat : SimpleDateFormat):
    String = if (s.isEmpty) s else  outputFormat.format(inputFormat.parse(s))   


cachedEvents.map(_.split("\t")).filter(_.length==61).map(
    e=> Event(
        toInt(e(0)),parse_date(e(1), inputFormat_ymd, outputFormat_ymd),parse_date(e(2), inputFormat_ym, outputFormat_ym),toInt(e(3)),toDouble(e(4)),e(5),e(6),e(7),e(8),e(9),e(10),e(11),e(12),e(13),e(14),e(15),e(16),e(17),e(18),e(19),e(20),
        e(21),e(22),e(23),e(24),toInt(e(25)),e(26),e(27),e(28),toInt(e(29)),toDouble(e(30)),toInt(e(31)),toInt(e(32)),toInt(e(33)),toDouble(e(34)),toInt(e(35)),e(36),e(37),e(38),e(39),toDouble(e(40)),
        toDouble(e(41)),e(42),toInt(e(43)),e(44),e(45),e(46),e(47),toDouble(e(48)),toDouble(e(49)),e(50),toInt(e(51)),e(52),e(53),e(54),e(55),toDouble(e(56)),toDouble(e(57)),e(58),parse_date(e(59),inputFormat_ymdhms, outputFormat_ymdhms),e(60))

).toDS.createOrReplaceTempView("events")

    e=> Event(
        toInt(e(0)),parse_date(e(1), inputFormat_ymd, outputFormat_ymd),parse_date(e(2), inputFormat_ym, outputFormat_ym),toInt(e(3)),toDouble(e(4)),e(5),e(6),e(7),e(8),e(9),e(10),e(11),e(12),e(13),e(14),e(15),e(16),e(17),e(18),e(19),e(20),
        e(21),e(22),e(23),e(24),toInt(e(25)),e(26),e(27),e(28),toInt(e(29)),toDouble(e(30)),toInt(e(31)),toInt(e(32)),toInt(e(33)),toDouble(e(34)),toInt(e(35)),e(36),e(37),e(38),e(39),toDouble(e(40)),
        toDouble(e(41)),e(42),toInt(e(43)),e(44),e(45),e(46),e(47),toDouble(e(48)),toDouble(e(49)),e(50),toInt(e(51)),e(52),e(53),e(54),e(55),toDouble(e(56)),toDouble(e(57)),e(58),parse_date(e(59),inputFormat_ymdhms, outputFormat_ymdhms),e(60))

).toDF()

events = events.withColumn("SQLDate_date",$"SQLDATE".cast("date"))

val Cameolocation = "/media/storage/gdelt/Cameo"
val file_Country = "CAMEO.country.txt"
val file_Ethnic = "CAMEO.ethnic.txt"
val file_Eventcodes = "CAMEO.eventcodes.txt"
val file_Knowngroup = "CAMEO.knowngroup.txt"
val file_Religion = "CAMEO.religion.txt"
val file_Type = "CAMEO.type.txt"
val file_Quad = "CAMEO.QuadClass.txt"
val file_GeoType = "CAMEO.GeoType.txt"
val file_FIPSCountryCode = "CAMEO.FIPSCountyCode.txt"

msg.data:
Cameolocation: String = /media/storage/gdelt/Cameo
file_Country: String = CAMEO.country.txt
file_Ethnic: String = CAMEO.ethnic.txt
file_Eventcodes: String = CAMEO.eventcodes.txt
file_Knowngroup: String = CAMEO.knowngroup.txt
file_Religion: String = CAMEO.religion.txt
file_Type: String = CAMEO.type.txt
file_Quad: String = CAMEO.QuadClass.txt
file_GeoType: String = CAMEO.GeoType.txt
file_FIPSCountryCode: String = CAMEO.FIPSCountyCode.txt

paragraphs.text:
// creation of the mapping dataset
val country_transco = spark.read.
    format("csv").
    option("header", true).
    option("delimiter", "\t").
    load(Cameolocation+"/"+file_Country)

val ethnic_transco = spark.read.
    format("csv").
    option("header", true).
    option("delimiter", "\t").
    load(Cameolocation+"/"+file_Ethnic)

val eventCodes_transco = spark.read.
    format("csv").
    option("header", true).
    option("delimiter", "\t").
    load(Cameolocation+"/"+file_Eventcodes)

val group_transco = spark.read.
    format("csv").
    option("header", true).
    option("delimiter", "\t").
    load(Cameolocation+"/"+file_Knowngroup)

val religion_transco = spark.read.
    format("csv").
    option("header", true).
    option("delimiter", "\t").
    load(Cameolocation+"/"+file_Religion)

val type_transco = spark.read.
    format("csv").
    option("header", true).
    option("delimiter", "\t").
    load(Cameolocation+"/"+file_Type)

val quad_transco = spark.read.
    format("csv").
    option("header", true).
    option("delimiter", "\t").
    load(Cameolocation+"/"+file_Quad)
    
val geoType_transco = spark.read.
    format("csv").
    option("header", true).
    option("delimiter", "\t").
    load(Cameolocation+"/"+file_GeoType)
    
val FIPS_transco = spark.read.
    format("csv").
    option("header", true).
    option("delimiter", "\t").
    load(Cameolocation+"/"+file_FIPSCountryCode)

paragraphs.text:
events = events.join(country_transco, events("Actor1CountryCode")===country_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor1CountryName", col("LABEL")).drop(country_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(country_transco, events("Actor2CountryCode")===country_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor2CountryName", col("LABEL")).drop(country_transco.columns: _*)

events = events.join(ethnic_transco, events("Actor1EthnicCode")===ethnic_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor1EthnicName", col("LABEL")).drop(ethnic_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(ethnic_transco, events("Actor2EthnicCode")===ethnic_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor2EthnicName", col("LABEL")).drop(ethnic_transco.columns: _*)

events = events.join(eventCodes_transco, events("EventCode")===eventCodes_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("EventCodeDesc", col("LABEL")).drop(eventCodes_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(eventCodes_transco, events("EventBaseCode")===eventCodes_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("EventBaseCodeDesc", col("LABEL")).drop(eventCodes_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(eventCodes_transco, events("EventRootCode")===eventCodes_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("EventRootCodeDesc", col("LABEL")).drop(eventCodes_transco.columns: _*)

events = events.join(group_transco, events("Actor1KnownGroupCode")===group_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor1KnownGroupName", col("LABEL")).drop(group_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(group_transco, events("Actor2KnownGroupCode")===group_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor2KnownGroupName", col("LABEL")).drop(group_transco.columns: _*)

events = events.join(religion_transco, events("Actor1Religion1Code")===religion_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor1Religion1Name", col("LABEL")).drop(religion_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(religion_transco, events("Actor1Religion2Code")===religion_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor1Religion2Name", col("LABEL")).drop(religion_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(religion_transco, events("Actor2Religion1Code")===religion_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor2Religion1Name", col("LABEL")).drop(religion_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(religion_transco, events("Actor2Religion2Code")===religion_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor2Religion2Name", col("LABEL")).drop(religion_transco.columns: _*)

events = events.join(type_transco, events("Actor1Type1Code")===type_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor1Type1Name", col("LABEL")).drop(type_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(type_transco, events("Actor1Type2Code")===type_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor1Type2Name", col("LABEL")).drop(type_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(type_transco, events("Actor1Type3Code")===type_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor1Type3Name", col("LABEL")).drop(type_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(type_transco, events("Actor2Type1Code")===type_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor2Type1Name", col("LABEL")).drop(type_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(type_transco, events("Actor2Type2Code")===type_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor2Type2Name", col("LABEL")).drop(type_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(type_transco, events("Actor2Type3Code")===type_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor2Type3Name", col("LABEL")).drop(type_transco.columns: _*)

events = events.join(quad_transco, events("QuadClass")===quad_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("QuadClassType", col("LABEL")).drop(quad_transco.columns: _*)

events = events.join(geoType_transco, events("Actor1Geo_Type")===geoType_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor1Geo_Name", col("LABEL")).drop(geoType_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(geoType_transco, events("Actor2Geo_Type")===geoType_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor2Geo_Name", col("LABEL")).drop(geoType_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(geoType_transco, events("ActionGeo_Type")===geoType_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("ActionGeo_Name", col("LABEL")).drop(geoType_transco.columns: _*)

events = events.join(FIPS_transco, events("Actor1Geo_CountryCode")===FIPS_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor1Geo_CountryName", col("LABEL")).drop(FIPS_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(FIPS_transco, events("Actor2Geo_CountryCode")===FIPS_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("Actor2Geo_CountryName", col("LABEL")).drop(FIPS_transco.columns: _*)
events = events.join(FIPS_transco, events("ActionGeo_CountryCode")===FIPS_transco("CODE"), "left").withColumn("ActionGeo_CountryName", col("LABEL")).drop(FIPS_transco.columns: _*)

paragraphs.text:
// Events avg tone between actors
val query_tone_actors_daily = "SELECT  Actor1Name, Actor2Name, SQLDATE, AVG(AvgTone) as DailyAvgTone FROM events Group by Actor1Name, Actor2Name, SQLDATE Order by  SQLDATE ASC"
val df_tone_actors_daily= sqlContext.sql(query_tone_actors_daily)
df_tone_actors_daily.drop()
z.show(sql(query_tone_actors_daily))
